page.title: 04A Day in the Life of a Child
page.content: "You are late for breakfast again Stephen,"screamed Mum.It was half past eight!When I got down stairs I ran in to the kitchen.I jumped on to my chair.Soon I was slurping up my branflakes and was making a terrible noise.My mum came in."You'd better go to school now,"she said.I ran off to get my school bag.I opened the door and ran off to school.When I got there our teacher was calling the register I dashed in,took off my coat and sat down.Next we did some Maths.After an hour it was playtime .I played marbles. We did some English for an hour,then it was 12.00 and lunch time. In the afternoon we did some art and craft for one hour. We had another playtime and we went for music,then we had a story and went home.I watched television until dinner at 6.00,then I read a book and went to bed at 8.30.
